    // Get UTM parameters from URL
    const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
    const utmSource = urlParams.get('utm_source') || 'unknown';
    const utmMedium = urlParams.get('utm_medium') || '';
    const utmCampaign = urlParams.get('utm_campaign') || '';
    
    // Store in sessionStorage for use across pages
    sessionStorage.setItem('utm_source', utmSource);
    sessionStorage.setItem('utm_medium', utmMedium);
    sessionStorage.setItem('utm_campaign', utmCampaign);
    
    // Add to hidden form fields
    const sourceField = document.getElementById('source_channel');
    if (sourceField) {
      sourceField.value = utmSource;
    }
    
    // Send custom event to Google Analytics
    if (typeof gtag === 'function') {
      gtag('event', 'special_offer_view', {
        'source': utmSource,
        'medium': utmMedium,
        'campaign': utmCampaign
      });
    }
  });
</script>

::: {.row .g-4}
::: {.col-lg-6}
::: {.feature-card}
### How is the consultation delivered?

The 8-hour consultation can be delivered in-person (for Sydney and Brisbane-based organizations) or remotely via Microsoft Teams. Sessions can be split into multiple meetings based on your preference and availability.
:::
:::

::: {.col-lg-6}
::: {.feature-card}
### When do I receive the gap analysis report?

You will receive your comprehensive gap analysis report within 10 business days of completing your consultation sessions. The report includes actionable recommendations and a detailed implementation roadmap.
:::
:::

::: {.col-lg-6}
::: {.feature-card}
### What if I'm already partway through implementation?

The Accelerator Package is customizable to meet you where you are. For organizations already implementing ISO 27001, we'll focus on addressing specific challenges, reviewing your current progress, and optimizing your approach to certification.
:::
:::

::: {.col-lg-6}
::: {.feature-card}
### How long does the Copilot Premium access last?

Your Kudoo Copilot Premium access is valid for 12 months from activation. It includes unlimited policy templates, implementation guidance, and priority support.
:::
:::

::: {.col-lg-6}
::: {.feature-card}
### What guarantee do you offer?

While we can't guarantee certification (as this depends on your organization's implementation and the certification body's assessment), we do guarantee that if you're not satisfied with the quality of our consultation or deliverables, we'll provide additional support at no extra cost.
:::
:::

::: {.col-lg-6}
::: {.feature-card}

We accept credit card, direct bank transfer, and purchase orders. Payment is required to secure your spot, with invoicing available for corporate customers.
